title: Spinach and mushroom stuffed meatloaf
ingredients: ['2 slices bread, crusts removed and diced', '1 tablespoon milk', '500g lean steak mince', 'seasoning', 'good pinch dried mixed herbs', '2 tablespoons Worcester sauce (plus 1 extra teaspoon for glaze)', '2 tablespoons tomato ketchup (plus 1 extra tablesoon for glaze)', '1 egg, beaten', '1 medium onion, roughly chopped', '1 clove garlic', '6 mushrooms, thinly sliced', '5 balls frozen chopped leaf spinach', '1 level teaspoon mustard powder']
